mapper.sql: id, interfaceName, interfaceUrl, pageUrl, fid, interfaceType, orderBy, isFlag
mapper.select: SELECT me.id, interfaceName, interfaceUrl, pageUrl, fid, interfaceType, orderBy, (select count(1) from sys_role_menu rm where rm.roleId = #{roleId} and me.id = rm.menuId)isFlag FROM sys_menu me WHERE me.interfaceType = 1 ORDER BY me.orderBy ASC

select am.id, interfaceName, interfaceUrl, pageUrl, fid, interfaceType, orderBy
,(select count(1) from sys_role_menu rm where rm.roleId = #{roleId} and am.id = rm.menuId)isFlag
,(SELECT count(1) from (SELECT DISTINCT menuId FROM sys_manager_role amr,sys_role_menu arm WHERE amr.managerId = #{managerId} AND amr.roleId = arm.roleId) aaa WHERE aaa.menuId = am.id) isFlag
from sys_menu am where am.isFlag = 1
AND am.interfaceType = 1
AND am.fid = #{fid}
ORDER BY am.orderBy ASC

SELECT DISTINCT am.interfaceUrl FROM sys_manager_role amr, sys_role_menu arm, sys_menu am WHERE amr.managerId = #{managerId} AND amr.roleId = arm.roleId AND am.id = arm.menuId AND am.isFlag = 1 AND am.interfaceUrl IS NOT NULL
